body: Can you specify the device to preserve the GPU compatibility ? You can call output.template chip<3>(i).device().setZero();, or if that's not implemented something like output.template chip<3>(i) = output.template chip<3>(i).constant(0);
body_html: Can you specify the device to preserve the GPU compatibility ? You can call output.template chip<3>(i).device().setZero();, or if that's not implemented something like output.template chip<3>(i) = output.template chip<3>(i).constant(0);
body_text: Can you specify the device to preserve the GPU compatibility ? You can call output.template chip<3>(i).device().setZero();, or if that's not implemented something like output.template chip<3>(i) = output.template chip<3>(i).constant(0);
